document.full_text: microsoft's $8.5 billion acquisition of skype is likely to boost videoconferencing from workers' desktops, posing further risks to video technology providers like polycom and logitech.
document.title: skype deal raises risks for videoconferencing firms
lines_and_colors: microsoft's $8.5 billion acquisition of skype is likely to boost videoconferencing from workers' desktops, posing further risks to video technology providers like polycom and logitech.
